intro_text: Graduated in Information Technology and currently pursuing a degree in Systems Analysis and Development. I work with React, Next.js, TailwindCSS, and TypeScript, in addition to learning C#. With advanced English skills and a focus on modern web solutions, I transform ideas into impactful digital experiences.
availability: Available for freelance projects and full-time employment.

skanderCapital.title: Skander Capital
skanderCapital.description: Creation of a multilingual and responsive website for Skander Capital, focusing on global investment solutions. User experience and intuitive design were optimized to represent Skander as a leader in the financial sector.

safexBroker.title: Safex Broker
safexBroker.description: Development of a secure web platform for trading digital assets and cryptocurrencies. Integration with real-time financial data APIs, ensuring a responsive and accessible interface.

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: I create responsive websites and high-performance web applications.

uiuxDesign.title: UI/UX Design
uiuxDesign.description: Intuitive and attractive designs that delight users.

mobileDevelopment.title: Mobile Development
mobileDevelopment.description: Native and hybrid mobile applications for iOS and Android.

seo.title: SEO
seo.description: Search engine optimization to increase your online visibility.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Speed and performance optimization for your applications.

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.description: Expert advice on digital and technological strategies.

paola.name: Paola Martins
paola.quote: The team exceeded all our expectations. The project was delivered ahead of schedule and with exceptional quality.

renato.name: Renato Augusto
renato.quote: The professionalism and creativity of the team turned our vision into reality. We are extremely satisfied with the result.

jorge.name: Jorge Cavalcante
jorge.quote: The attention to detail and post-project support were impressive. I highly recommend their services without hesitation.
